description: The .32 ACP was a popular handgun cartridge in the 20th century. This bullet has been imbued by a druid's will and pollen will explode on landing, which can blind and slow.
The .32 ACP was a popular handgun cartridge in the 20th century. This bullet has been magically shaped by an Earthshaper to turn into fragments upon impact.
The .32 ACP was a popular handgun cartridge in the 20th century. This bullet has been imbued with fire from a Kelvinist.
The .32 ACP was a popular handgun cartridge in the 20th century. This bullet has been imbued with ice from a Kelvinist and will try to freeze enemies in place.
The .32 ACP was a popular handgun cartridge in the 20th century. This bullet has been imbued with lightning from a Stormshaper and will bounce from enemy to enemy.
The .32 ACP was a popular handgun cartridge in the 20th century. This bullet has been tinkered with by a technomancer to corrupt robotics.
